titleInfo.title: SCIO: An Ontology to Support the Formalization of Pre-Clinical Spinal Cord Injury Experiments

name.namePart: 3rd Joint Ontology Workshops: Ontologies and Data in the Life Sciences
Automatically Populating a Preclinical Spinal Cord Injury Knowledge Base to Support Clinical Translation

titleInfo.title: Proceedings of the 3rd Joint Ontology Workshops (JOWO): Ontologies and Data in the Life Sciences
